cab.content: //From Viceroy, 23rd June 1918. (Received 24th, 11 a.m.)Secret. Weekly report. North-West Frontier. Turn-Turn attacked Dera-Tank road : cli-ivev killed, passengers looted. Maliauds suspected. Khost outlaws killed man in Bamin district. Constabulary killed two well-known outlaws. Elsewhere all quiet.Circulated by the Secretary of State for India. * ^Gsecret.
